application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - Condition 3
Insufficient information has been provided to meet the requirements of condition 3, as such the Council cannot be satisfied that be satisfied of the suitability of the proposed materials, in the interests of the appearance of the locality, in accordance with policy LP1 of the Wandsworth Local Plan (2023) and condition 3 can therefore not be discharged at this time.

Reason : 2 - Condition 4
Insufficient information has been provided to meet the requirements of condition 4, as such the Council cannot be satisfied that the risk of flooding o fthe proposed development and future occupants, and third parties, and the amenity of the area in compliance with policies LP2 and LP12 of the Wandsworth Local PLan 2023 would be sufficiently protected and condition 4 can therefore not be discharged at this time.

Reason : 3 - Condition 5
Insufficient information has been provided to meet the requirements of condition 5, as such the Council cannot be satisfied that the interests of biodiversity in compliance with policy LP55 of the Wandsworth Local Plan 2023 would be sufficiently protected and condition 5 can therefore not be discharged at this time.

Reason : 4 - Condition 6
Insufficient information has been provided to meet the requirements of condition 6, as such the Council cannot be satisfied that the interests of biodiversity in compliance with policy LP55 of the Wandsworth Local Plan 2023 would be sufficiently protected and condition 5 can therefore not be discharged at this time.

Reason : 5 - Condition 7
Insufficient information has been provided to meet the requirements of condition 7, as such the Council cannot be satisfied that neighbours amenity in compliance with policy LP2 of the Wandsworth Local Plan would be sufficiently protected and condition 7 can therefore not be discharged at this time.

Reason : 6 - Condition 8
Insufficient information has been provided to meet the requirements of condition 8, as such the Council cannot be satisfied that neighbours amenity in compliance with policies LP2 of the Wandsworth Local Plan 2023 would be sufficiently protected and condition 8 can therefore not be discharged at this time.

Reason : 7 - Condition 10
Insufficient information has been provided to meet the requirements of condition 10, as such the Council cannot be satisfied that the the interest of aircraft safety in accordance with the safeguarding direction coupled with the requirements of the National Planning Policy Framework 2019 would be
sufficiently protected and condition 10 can therefore not be discharged at this time.

Reason : 8 - Condition 12
Insufficient information has been provided to meet the requirements of condition 12, as such the Council cannot be satisfied that sustainable development in compliance with policy LP1-0 of the Wandsworth Local Plan 2023 would be sufficiently provided and condition 12 can therefore not be discharged at this time.

Reason : 9 - Condition 3 - Required additional information 
Specific details are required on the propsoed materials to be used on the external surfaces of the development. Sample materials should also be provided.

Reason : 10 - Condition 4 - Required additional information 
Full engineering drawings which demonstrate the final proposed option for the gangway. 
A technical note to explain the design proposal and a technical note to demonstrate that the structural integrity of the flood defence would not be negatively impacted by any additional loading and that the access ganway can be removed to accomodate any future raisings as per the Thame Estury 2100 Plan.

Reason : 11 - Condition 5 - Required additional information 
Information to demonstrate that the proposed strucure and works will not negatively affect the flood defence due to excess loading or friction. It must be demonstrateed that any proposed structure or works will not negatively affect or prevent access, maintenance and future raising of the flood defence.
A sensitive construction lighting plan; details on the construction methods associated with the timber grid; details on the access assembly; information on how the vegetation will be sensitively transferred from the wall to the timber cladding if necessary; details on the removal of butterfly bush; details on how the disturbance to the mudflats would be avoided; and details on how rubbish and debris within the inlet would be cleared would also be required.

Reason : 12 - Condition 6 - Required additional information 
Final details on the specific bird boxes proposed should be supplied.
A final lighting plan and details on the proposed colour temperature should also be supplied.

Reason : 13 - Condition 7 - Required additional information 
Specific and final detials of the propsoed soundproofing measures to be implemented as part of the devleopment. A technical assessment on the levels of soundproofing which would outline an adequate reduction of noise disruption.

Reason : 14 - Condition 8 - Required additional information 
Full detials on the waste storage and amount to be provided on board. Final details on the pick up location of the proposed refuse and recycling in a location on land. Additional supporting information should also be supplied providing the amount of boats currently docked at Oyster Wharf.

Reason : 15 - Condition 10 - Required additional information 
Information providing details of the erection of any cranes and river access to be utlisied as part of the propsoed development.

Reason : 16 - Condition 12 - Required additional information 
Calculations on the waste and efficency of the water storage, to ensure compliance with the maximum water use of 105 litres per person.
description: Details of materials; access gangway and associated stairs; construction method plan; timber support and ecological habitats; sound insulation; location of refuse and recycling storage; cycle storage; sewage and water waste; water efficiency and details that no crane is required pursuant to conditions 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 and 12 of planning permission dated 29/06/2021 ref 2021/0457 (Construction of a floating residential vessel in the dock known as Oyster Wharf inlet.)
